verses.text: All the commandments which I command thee this day shall ye observe to do , that ye may live , and multiply , and go in and possess the land which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* sware unto your fathers.

And thou shalt remember all the way which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God led thee these forty years in the wilderness , to humble thee, \add and\add* to prove thee, to know what \add was\add* in thine heart , whether thou wouldest keep his commandments , or no.

And he humbled thee, and suffered thee to hunger , and fed thee with manna , which thou knewest not, neither did thy fathers know ; that he might make thee know that man doth not live by bread only , but by every \add word\add* that proceedeth out of the mouth of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* doth man live.
Thy raiment waxed not old upon thee, neither did thy foot swell , these forty years.
Thou shalt also consider in thine heart , that, as a man chasteneth his son , \add so\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God chasteneth thee.
Therefore thou shalt keep the commandments of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , to walk in his ways , and to fear him.
For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God bringeth thee into a good land , a land of brooks of water , of fountains and depths that spring out of valleys and hills ;
A land of wheat , and barley , and vines , and fig trees , and pomegranates ; a land of oil olive , and honey ;\f + \fr 8.8 \ft of oil…: Heb. of olive tree of oil\f*
A land wherein thou shalt eat bread without scarceness , thou shalt not lack any \add thing\add* in it; a land whose stones \add are\add* iron , and out of whose hills thou mayest dig brass. \p
When thou hast eaten and art full , then thou shalt bless the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God for the good land which he hath given thee.
Beware that thou forget not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , in not keeping his commandments , and his judgments , and his statutes , which I command thee this day :
Lest \add when\add* thou hast eaten and art full , and hast built goodly houses , and dwelt \add therein;\add*
And \add when\add* thy herds and thy flocks multiply , and thy silver and thy gold is multiplied , and all that thou hast is multiplied ;
Then thine heart be lifted up , and thou forget the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , which brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt , from the house of bondage ;

Who led thee through that great and terrible wilderness , \add wherein were\add* fiery serpents , and scorpions , and drought , where \add there was\add* no water ; who brought thee forth water out of the rock of flint ;
Who fed thee in the wilderness with manna , which thy fathers knew not, that he might humble thee, and that he might prove thee, to do thee good at thy latter end ;
And thou say in thine heart , My power and the might of \add mine\add* hand hath gotten me this wealth.

But thou shalt remember the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God : for \add it is\add* he that giveth thee power to get wealth , that he may establish his covenant which he sware unto thy fathers , as \add it is\add* this day.

And it shall be, if thou do at all forget the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , and walk after other gods , and serve them, and worship them, I testify against you this day that ye shall surely perish.

As the nations which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* destroyeth before your face , so shall ye perish ; because ye would not be obedient unto the voice of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God.
